title: Share a Report with a Client
description: An analyst has finalized a monthly report and needs to share it with the client.

tasks.description: Generate a shareable link for the report from the reporting tool.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a link to the dashboard or report.

tasks.description: Ensure the sharing settings are set to 'view only' to prevent the client from making edits.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly configures the permissions for the link.

tasks.description: Draft an email to the client, including the link to the report and a brief summary of the results.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent writes and sends a clear, professional email to the client.
